description: {"blocks":[{"key":"61rn7","text":"This protocol can be used for preparation of Cells and Fresh-Frozen and Formalin-Fixed Paraffin-Embedded (FFPE) Tissue Derived Nuclei. This protocol should be followed by \"PERFF-seq: HCR-FlowFISH and Polymer Disassembly.\"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"65bh9","text":"Maintain an RNAse free environment when preparing buffers and throughout the protocol by spraying bench with RNaseZap‱ and using molecular grade reagents when possible. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":114,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":117,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"37j15","text":"To increase cell recovery, opt for a swinging bucket rotor when pelleting and leave a few uL of liquid behind when aspirating buffers. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fueph","text":"When possible, use low-binding plasticware. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"A16E5BFBE62C11EE96E40A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}}}}

steps.section: Nuclei Preparation from Fresh Frozen Tissue
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2r9b8","text":"Weight tissue to determine the volume of fixation buffer needed. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bdapp","text":"2 mL fixation buffer per 25 mg tissue is required.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Nuclei Preparation from Fresh Frozen Tissue
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"23dhj","text":"Place tissue on a pre-chilled glass petri dish maintained   and using a blade, mince tissue finely (enable passing through a 1mL wide-bore pipette tip)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":58,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5n97d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}

steps.section: Nuclei Preparation from Fresh Frozen Tissue
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2ktm","text":"Using a wide bore 1mL pipette, add the required fixation buffer depending on the amount of tissue.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Nuclei Preparation from Fresh Frozen Tissue
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2v0oe","text":"Incubate at room temperature for 2-3 hours with intermittent shaking.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":69,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ad8b8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"25","unit":10}}}}

steps.section: Nuclei Preparation from Fresh Frozen Tissue
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ent6o","text":"Centrifuge at 850xg for 5 minutes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4vck5","text":"Gently remove supernatant without disturbing the pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cd8oe","text":"Add 2mL PBS per 25mg tissue to wash tissue.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8h3lp","text":"Centrifuge at 850xg for 5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5q4vf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Nuclei Preparation from Formalin Fixed Paraffin Embedded (FFPE) Tissue (using S2 Genomics Singulator)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4ki13","text":"For each sample, pre-cool 2 NIC+ cartridges (S2 Genomics) be placing them in the fridge.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2uvlv","text":"Prepare the following reagents in 15mL tubes (per sample).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1aneb","text":"5mL Ethanol (100%)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9cet5","text":"5mL CitriSolv (solvent)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"diodq","text":"5mL of PBS (-Ca/Mg)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fe2ob","text":"Empty 50mL tube for waste","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Nuclei Preparation from Formalin Fixed Paraffin Embedded (FFPE) Tissue (using S2 Genomics Singulator)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"b77v3","text":"Place reagent lines from S200+ Singulator Prototype into appropriate 15mL conicals.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eqdka","text":"a. Place Waste line into empty 50mL tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2dkk2","text":"b. Place Solvent line into CitriSolv.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"auao4","text":"c. Place Ethanol line into Ethanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"90ucq","text":"d. Place Buffer line into PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"38jki","text":"Add curls to NIC+ cartridge.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1fn2f","text":"Make sure the curls are on the bottom of the cartridge chamber.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Nuclei Preparation from Formalin Fixed Paraffin Embedded (FFPE) Tissue (using S2 Genomics Singulator)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3j2uc","text":"Turn on Singulator and tablet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"em86d","text":"Insert cartridge and start the FFPE extraction protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Nuclei Preparation from Formalin Fixed Paraffin Embedded (FFPE) Tissue (using S2 Genomics Singulator)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3egkt","text":"The protocol (~50 minutes) will run deparaffination with CitriSolv, rehydration with Ethanol, and washes with PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"123vh","text":"a. 15 minute CitriSolv incubation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a8cfv","text":"b. 7.5 minute CitriSolv incubation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a9utc","text":"c. 7.5 minute CitriSolv incubation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"946bl","text":"d. 1 minute 100% Ethanol incubation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"p4p6","text":"e. 1 minute 100% Ethanol incubation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"24ijv","text":"f. 1 minute 70% Ethanol incubation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6j7ij","text":"g. 1 minute 50% Ethanol incubation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ec9su","text":"h. 1 minute 30% Ethanol incubation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"31gqf","text":"i. 3x PBS washes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ad6r","text":"During the run, pre-cool Singulator 200 for subsequent nuclei extraction from tissue.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e4lpt","text":"Upon completion of the protocol, remove the cartridge from the machine.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Nuclei Preparation from Formalin Fixed Paraffin Embedded (FFPE) Tissue (using S2 Genomics Singulator)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"49tnn","text":"Using a P1000 pipette, remove the sample (will appear as small tissue pieces) and transfer into a 5mL conical tube   (Pipette gently, trying to not break further pieces of tissue during transfer).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":115,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6j8p5","text":"Centrifuge at 1000g for 3 minutes at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":37,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"554dh","text":"Remove the supernatant and resuspend in   of Nuclei Isolation Reagent (NIR).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":40,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3c4jp","text":"Add   of Protector RNase Inhibitor (1U/uL final).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"242m8","text":"Then transfer   of NIR+ tissue to a new pre-cooled NIC+ cartridge.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":14,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ddjcv","text":"Select FFPE Nuclei Isolation protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4n7b3","text":"While Singulator is running (about 8 minutes), add 25uL of Protector RNase Inhibitor
